scripts.dev: source .env && forge create --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY src/Counter.sol:Counter --json > contractInfo.json
scripts.deploy-mumbai: source .env && forge create --rpc-url https://rpc.ankr.com/polygon_mumbai --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY src/Counter.sol:Counter --legacy  --json > contractInfo.json
